Package com.collective.app.utils

Class UI

java.lang.Object
com.collective.app.utils.UI
public class UI
extends java.lang.Object
This is the class that contains all of the functions most commonly used for the buttons and h/v boxes
Author:
Aaron

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int height

    this is the size for a lot of the elements within the UI

    this value is for the spacing between buttons
    private int width
    this is the width of the application window

    • createButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button createButton​(Controller controller, PageIdentifier page, java.lang.String Title)
      This Creates the button so that it changes pages
      Parameters:
      controller - , instance of the controller
      page - , this is the page that the button will go to
      Title - , this is the name of the button when it is created
      Returns:
      Button, it returns the button that was just created and now can change between pages
